articles.title: JPMorgan lays out the nightmare election scenario that could send markets into a tailspin
articles.description: Much of Wall Street views the Trump campaign's efforts to overturn the election results as a desperate sideshow destined to fail. But JPMorgan is telling clients there's still a chance that this process descends into chaos. It is 2020, after all.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: This is *exactly* why Republican leaders need to speak up against Trump's election lies
articles.description: In the face of President Donald Trump's wild and fact-free claims about supposed voter fraud in the 2020 election, congressional Republicans -- and other elected GOP leaders -- have stood largely silent. And that silence has a price.
